description: Implement Phase 1 UX improvements to the CodeRef Explorer sidebar widget to enhance usability, navigation, and visual clarity

orchestrator_instructions.role: Coordinate multi-phase implementation across 4 agents, synthesize outputs, validate phase gates before proceeding to next phase

steps.step_1: READ communication.json to understand agent assignments and phase structure
steps.step_2: MONITOR agent subdirectories for completion status in each agent's communication.json
steps.step_3: VALIDATE phase_gate criteria for each agent before marking phase complete
steps.step_4: SYNTHESIZE outputs from all agents into orchestrator-synthesis.md (implementation summary, test results, documentation updates, validation report)
steps.step_5: UPDATE communication.json phases.phase_1.status='complete' when all agents complete
steps.step_6: PROVIDE go/no-go recommendation for Phase 2 based on phase gate validation

agent_instructions.role: Each agent implements their assigned tasks in isolated subdirectory, following hierarchical session pattern

steps.step_1: NAVIGATE to your agent subdirectory: {session}/{ agent-id}/
steps.step_2: READ resources/index.md to access all source documents and specifications
steps.step_3: READ instructions.json for detailed execution steps and task breakdown
steps.step_4: CREATE workorder in agent home project using /create-workorder with context_json_template from instructions.json
steps.step_5: UPDATE communication.json: Add workorder details to outputs.workorders_created[] and set status='in_progress'
steps.step_6: FOR EACH TASK: Implement → Update communication.json (add to files_created/files_modified) → Mark task.status='complete'
steps.step_7: RUN tests and validate all success metrics
steps.step_8: VERIFY file tracking: Compare git diff vs communication.json arrays, add any missing files
steps.step_9: CREATE final output in outputs/ directory
steps.step_10: UPDATE communication.json: status='complete', completion timestamp, final metrics
steps.step_11: VALIDATE phase_gate_checklist - all criteria must pass

output_format: Mixed (TypeScript components + JSON validation + Markdown documentation)

quality_standards.completeness: All Phase 1 features implemented and tested (resizable sidebar, scroll container, persistence, visual hierarchy)
quality_standards.accuracy: Components follow existing CodeRef Dashboard patterns (Tailwind ind-* tokens, TypeScript strict mode, React hooks best practices)
quality_standards.format: TypeScript code follows project conventions, documentation updated in resource sheets, tests achieve 80%+ coverage

success_criteria.coderef-dashboard: All components implemented, tests pass, TypeScript compiles without errors
success_criteria.coderef-docs: Resource sheets updated with new sidebar features, CLAUDE.md reflects changes
success_criteria.coderef-testing: Test suite covers resize, scroll, persistence, visual changes
success_criteria.papertrail: All deliverables validate against UDS schemas, no critical issues

criteria: All Phase 1 tasks complete across all agents
User can resize sidebar, width persists across sessions
phase_1_to_phase_2.decision: Orchestrator provides go/no-go recommendation in synthesis report
